main event: A sighting of a bright yellowish object was reported in the San Francisco area on August 2, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as changing colors while moving through the sky., The sighting was also reported from Hamilton Air Force Base., A witness reported that the object did not leave a trail and was tracked on ground radar., Witnesses reported seeing a bright light moving quickly at an altitude above commercial aircraft., The object gradually faded from view below the horizon.
witness description: Witnesses included GD Island and Kathleen, who reported seeing the object from different locations.
